text:
18+ ONLY

Hello, I have two noncon Matsu prompts I really want to do, feel free to pick your favorite!

1. I want to play as a monster girl/boy who kidnaps a Matsu and makes him their pet. Stuffs him with tentacles, shares him with other monsters, all that good stuff. Any Matsu is good with me! I just want to see them stuffed in every hole, wrapped up in silk bondage, molested by goo, or whatever we come up with!

2. I want to play as a group of faceless men or women who kidnap a Matsu (or more) and makes them into tickle slaves. Running feathers along his body, hooking him up to a machine that tickles him everywhere, making him so sensitive to light touches that even the briefest contact makes him squirm... that'd be fun.

I have a ton of kinks, so I'll just list my hard no's: unsanitary stuff, vomit, bestiality, gore, vore, mpreg, and death. I look forward to roleplaying with you!
Monsters and Matsus sounds absolutely delightful
(( doesn't it? I'd love to do that one! did you have any preference for which Matsu(s) you'd play?
I have a real soft spot for Ichimatau honestly.
(( so do I! I think he'd be fun for this prompt
That’s fantastic! He’s definitely perfect for a more “spooky” setting
(( I agree! So, did you have any kinks you wanted to share?
So I’m really into gags, extreme bondage, petplay, permanent bondage, and basically anything along those lines
(( oh yeah, you're speaking my language! I think we're going to have a lot of fun torturing poor Ichi
Well I certainly like the sound of that
(( maybe Ichi could be on vacation on an island of some sorts? either that, or an RPG-esqe character who gets jumped
Hm...I like the idea of an island vacation gone horribly wrong
(( good idea! maybe the first monster clan he runs into are sentient slimes? accidentally steps on one and it envelopes him before dragging him back to its cave
That sounds great. Honestly I like the idea of Ichi being completely inside a see through slime and it’s formed tentacles to fuck him with internally. It’s just sliding around with its new pet
(( oh hell yes, that sounds great! maybe he's stuck in slime for a few days, violated and toyed with while he's immobile and only able to make muffled whimpers
Unbeknownst to Ichi, the slime actually works for some other monster who the slime is taking its new captive to
(( oh I like that idea. maybe a big, scary monster with a lot of monster lackeys that are allowed to play with the new toy whenever they like
Yeah! Maybe it eventually ends up turning Ichi into a monster too? But he isn’t particularly intimidating considering he’s just passed around and fucked by the others

(( yeah that works for me!

Would you be okay with starting us off?
Sure thing

Ichi swiped a hand over his forehead to wipe away the beads of sweat that had been forming since the sun had reached its highest point. Why he’d thought a nature hike so far from the hotel would be a good plan, he had no idea. Now he was hot and miserable.

And lost. “Shit,” he swears under his breath as he takes a look around. Somehow the trail he’d been on had disappeared without him noticing and there was no telling how long he’d been walking straight into the wilderness with no idea what he was doing.

Grumbling, Ichi stomps through the underbrush in search of the path.

Unbeknownst to Ichi, the island he chose to take his vacation on is filled to the brim with unique wildlife, creatures that would fit perfectly in a fantasy manga or video game. For example, slimes  are very commonplace, particularly those with a mischievous and devilish nature. Unfortunately for the Matsu, a perverted slime is nearby, sticking to Ichi's shoe after taking a few stomps forward.

Deciding it likes Ichi, the slime starts to expand and climb up his body, enveloping him in its own gooey makeup. When it's finished, Ichi is completely encased in the slime, the monster's substance see-through and allowing other monsters to take a look at its prey.

“What the...?”

Having heard a slippery sound, Ichi barely has enough time to glance at the substance coating the bottom of his shoe before it starts to envelope him completely. He can hardly move in the gooey substance and he has no control in its movements now that he’s suspended several feet off the ground.

The slime works quickly, secreting a substance that melts Ichi's clothes off and leaves him completely naked and on display. With his pet immobile and helpless, the slime constricts, squeezing Ichi in a tight embrace. It's almost like a hug, or at least the closest approximation it can do.

Then gooey tentacles start to form inside the slime, two large ones stuffing Ichi's mouth and ass as the thrust in tandem with each other. The goo tightens around Ichi, the slime trying its hardest to get a noisy reaction out of its new plaything.

It only takes a matter of seconds before the slime gets what it wants from Ichi. He gargles a scream the moment he feels his clothes completely disappear and the slime move in to immediately fill up the minuscule gap left behind. It’s the perfect opportunity to ram a sticky tentacle down his throat, creating a sizable bulge that moves with each and every thrust. 

With the surprising amount of strength in its “grip” Ichi can hardly move no matter how much he wants to struggle against the tentacle thrusting into his ass, muffled and terrified screams turning into confused moans of pleasure.
